means: （距离，长度）长的( long的比较级 )
（因忙或不愉快等）似乎比实际时间长的

sentence.Network_en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentence.Network_en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

sentence.Network_en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

Sentence.sentence: Hardback and trade paperbacks for "serious" nonfiction and fiction will surely last longer.
